### **Upload Dataset**

In this section, the *dataset* that will be used throughout the application will be downloaded and configured, the *dataset* must be in *.csv* or *.xlsx* format. After the *Upload* you can configure your *dataset* in order to allow a better view of it. If you want to change the name of some columns of the *dataset*, as well as factorize some of these columns, proceed to the next submenu called **Dataset Changes**, otherwise, proceed to the selection of the variables of interest in the menu **Variables Definition**.
